body:
`statusEl` is wrapped in a `<span>` because we can't do `statusEl = <i className="fa fa-circle-thin pre" /> Initializing;`. Originally it was `[<i className="fa fa-circle=thin pre" />, 'Initializing']`, which works, but React got grumpy about not setting a key on the icon, and it was just a little messier.

You're write, moving the text and icon into prefs instead of repeating the JSX all the time helped. Want to merge this now?
